$WmMPID_ハタリニケ,ch11_09_Nike_F_Hartari,Face|You're Karla, yes? I've heard tell that
your sword arm is beyond compare.
Show us what you can do.$k$p$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|Normally I'd oblige, but I'm using a
lance in this tournament. And for the
first time, I might add.$k$pI may end up having to rely on you
for some support, Queen. Or should I
say...partner?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハタリカアラ,ch03_19_Karla_F_Hatari,Face|Looks like I need a little more
practice after all...$k$p$Sbs150|
